### relations

#### Req:
```
Path:         /im.relation/relations
Method:       POST
Content-Type: application/json
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	//hex(sha256(join(sort(["user_"+userid1+"_"+name,"group_"+groupid1+"_"+name,"user_"+userid2+"_"+name]),",")))
	//value length must == 64
	"current_hash":"str"
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
#### Resp:
```
Fail:    httpcode:4xx/5xx
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{"code":123,"msg":"error message"}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Success: httpcode:200
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{
	//if the current_hash is same,this field is false
	"update":true,
	//if the current_hash is same,this field is empty
	//object relation_info
	"relations":[{},{}]
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
relation_info: {
	//empty means this is self
	"target":"str",
	//user or group
	"target_type":"str",
	"name":"str",
	//only when the group's member use this field,0-normal,1-system owner,2-owner,3-admin
	//uint32
	"duty":0
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
### group_members

#### Req:
```
Path:         /im.relation/group_members
Method:       POST
```

```
Fail:    httpcode:4xx/5xx

{"code":123,"msg":"error message"}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Success: httpcode:200
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
{

	"update":true,
	//if the current_hash is same,this field is empty
	//object relation_info
	"members":[{},{}]
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
relation_info: {
	//empty means this is self
	"target":"str",
	//user or group
	"target_type":"str",
	"name":"str",
	//only when the group's member use this field,0-normal,1-system owner,2-owner,3-admin
	//uint32
	"duty":0
}
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
```
